definitions.definition: Relating to the alveoli ( small air sacs ) of the lungs .
Relating to the jaw ridge containing the tooth sockets .
Formed with the tongue touching or approaching the inner ridge of the gums of the upper front teeth .
Relating to the glands with secretory cells about a central space.

main_definition: ( anatomy , relational ) Relating to the alveoli ( small air sacs ) of the lungs .

( phonetics ) Formed with the tongue touching or approaching the inner ridge of the gums of the upper front teeth .
( anatomy , relational ) Relating to the glands with secretory cells about a central space.
